fields.text: Welcome to Affirm, where you can pay for purchases in simple, fixed monthly payments.
For assistance with payments or your account, press '[INDEX]'.
To make a payment or review your balance, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to a payments specialist.
To update your account information, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to account services.
For merchant partnerships or checkout support, press '[INDEX]'.
If you are a merchant or retailer partner, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to our merchant partnerships team.
For help using Affirm at checkout, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to checkout support.
